derivation: from G3844 (παραμυθέομαι) and the middle voice of a derivative of G3454 (παραμυθέομαι);
strongs_def: to relate near, i.e. (by implication) encourage, console
outline:
1. to speak to, address one, whether by way of admonition and incentive, or to calm and console
    1. to encourage, console
